product_name: Hiking Trails of the Smokies - 3rd Edition
long_description: You'll find detailed descriptions of every trail in Great Smoky Mountains National Park that is officially recognized and maintained by the NPS. Softcover; 583 pages; includes an individual all-park trail map and individual trail profile maps. Great Smoky Mountains Association; copyright 2003. The all-park map will provide orientation and is helpful for trip planning. Each trail narrative carries a Map Key code that refers to the grid along the border of the all-park map. Trail profile maps accompany each narrative and show how long and how rigorous each trail is and locate major landmarks and trial junctions.
short_description: You'll find detailed descriptions of every trail in Great Smoky Mountains National Park that is officially recognized and maintained by the NPS.
